scene_target: Artie receives a cursed reward that escalates the danger from a single encounter to a zone-wide threat.
goal: Introduce the 'Participation Trophy' item and trigger a mass-aggro event in the Slime Fields.
conflict: Artie must survive a swarm of enemies with only 1 HP and a weapon that makes him a target.
constraints: depict the 'Participation Trophy' as a physical item Artie must hold
end_condition: Artie is forced to run for his life as the tutorial zone aggros on him.

set.reason: Level up to 3 and acquisition of the cursed Participation Trophy.

persona_updates: Artie is beginning to realize that the System's rewards are often as dangerous as its monsters.
Artie's frustration with the System is peaking as he realizes he is a 'god of destruction' who can be killed by a stray sneeze.

global_continuity_system_updates.reason: System error Math.div(0) avoided by rounding up to 'Absurd' during reward calculation.

inventory_alignment_updates.reason: Acquisition of Participation Trophy and transition to flight posture.

chapter_so_far_add: Artie's success in combat backfired when the System awarded him a cursed beacon that aggroed the entire tutorial zone.
key_events: Artie acquired the ITEM_PARTICIPATION_TROPHY, which is soul-bound and cursed with the 'Beacon of Trash' effect.
Artie reached Level 3, though his 5 new stat points are being held for verification by the System.
The 'Beacon of Trash' effect triggered a zone-wide aggro event, drawing thousands of slimes toward Artie.
Artie's stamina depleted to 45/100 as he began a desperate sprint toward the Oakhaven gate.
The System Administrator mocked Artie's request for a manager through a UI notification.
last_scene: Artie received the cursed Participation Trophy as a reward for his overkill victory in the Slime Fields.
The trophy's beacon effect triggered a zone-wide aggro event, turning the tutorial area into a sea of hostile slimes.
Artie reached Level 3 and began a frantic run toward the Oakhaven gate to reset the aggro and survive.
